channel.title: Major problem please help (cache related i think)
channel.description:
hey, so i tried to start dev my server again i had all the files still on a harddrive i put them all on my computer again and went to run, it keeps popping up saying unable to download.... it have my cache in C: drive and i have tried othere servers but it happens to all, PLEEEEEEAAAAAAAASSSSSSEEEEEEE HELP ME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
-WILLIAM-

item.title: Major problem please help (cache related i think)
item.dc:creator: @williams15 williams15
item.description:
@williams15 wrote:

i manually added it, i used a different client and cache it works fine, but now i have a big tree in the middle of the main walking area :S

Read full topic

item.title: Major problem please help (cache related i think)
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

williams15:

hello i am using a moddifed version of trisidiax v3 but i have tried several other sources with there own client and cache i checked the cache path it says it needs to be put in C: i have but still nothing, any ideas?

Did you add cache manually into C:? Or do you mean it does not download cache?

Read full topic

item.title: Major problem please help (cache related i think)
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

What servers are you “trying” it on? Perhaps you are using the same client for all of the servers you are trying it on and the client auto-downloads the cache. IF the client is trying to auto-download the cache and the error is appearing, there is a possibility the link to the cache download is unavailable.

Read full topic
